description: HomePilot Model Catalog - Curated models for all providers

chat.label: Llama 3 8B

chat.description: High-quality 70B parameter model. Excellent reasoning and coding.

chat.description: Mixture of Experts model with excellent performance.

chat.description: Alibaba's Qwen 2.5 model with strong multilingual support.

chat.label: Phi-3 3.8B
chat.description: Microsoft's compact model with strong reasoning.

chat.description: Google's Gemma 2 model with excellent efficiency.

image.label: SDXL Base 1.0

image.label: Flux.1 Schnell
image.description: Fast Flux model optimized for speed. 4-step generation. Note: Requires additional files (CLIP, VAE).

image.label: Flux.1 Dev
image.description: High-quality Flux model for detailed generations. Note: Requires additional files (CLIP, VAE).

image.label: Pony Diffusion v6 XL
image.description: SDXL-based model fine-tuned for anime/illustration. Uncensored, supports NSFW content.

image.label: Stable Diffusion 1.5
image.description: Classic SD 1.5 model. Fast, lightweight.

image.label: Realistic Vision v5.1
image.description: Photorealistic SD 1.5 model.

image.description: Versatile model for artistic and realistic styles. Uncensored, excellent for NSFW content.

image.label: Deliberate v3
image.description: High-quality photorealistic model. Uncensored, great for adult content generation.

image.label: epiCRealism Pure Evolution
image.description: Ultra-realistic model for photorealistic generations. Fully uncensored for adult content.

image.label: CyberRealistic v4.2
image.description: Photorealistic model optimized for portraits and figures. Uncensored NSFW support.

image.label: AbsoluteReality v1.8.1
image.description: Highly realistic model for lifelike images. Full NSFW capability.

image.label: aZovya RPG Artist v5
image.description: Fantasy/RPG style artwork model. Supports uncensored adult content.

image.label: Unstable Diffusion
image.description: Community model trained without content restrictions. Designed for adult content.

image.label: MajicMix Realistic v7
image.description: Asian-focused photorealistic model. Uncensored for NSFW generations.

image.label: BBMix v4
image.description: Versatile model for realistic and semi-realistic styles. Full NSFW support.

image.label: AbyssOrangeMix3 (AOM3)
image.description: Premier SD 1.5 anime model. Excellent for fan service, ecchi, and mature anime content. Rich colors, detailed illustrations.

image.label: Counterfeit V3.0

image.label: Anything V5 (Prt-RE)
image.description: Versatile anime model for all styles. Supports NSFW content with excellent anatomy and composition.

video.label: Stable Video Diffusion XT 1.1
video.description: Latest SVD model with 25 frames, 1024x576 resolution.

edit.label: SDXL Inpainting 0.1 (Checkpoint)
edit.description: High-quality inpainting backbone for natural edits (object removal, region replace) at 1024px.

edit.label: SD 1.5 Inpainting (Fast fallback)
edit.description: Fast and stable 512px inpainting fallback. Great for low-VRAM servers.

edit.label: ControlNet SD1.5 Inpaint (Guidance)
edit.description: ControlNet inpaint guidance to preserve structure and blend edits naturally (SD1.5).

edit.label: Segment Anything (SAM ViT-H)
edit.description: Optional auto-mask helper (Segment Anything Model). Useful for background removal / object selection.

edit.label: Background Remove (U2Net ONNX)
edit.description: Optional background removal helper used by rembg-style workflows.

enhance.label: 4x UltraSharp (Upscale)
enhance.description: Sharp, clean 4x upscaler for general photos.

enhance.label: RealESRGAN x4+ (Photo)
enhance.description: Excellent photo upscaling with natural texture recovery.

enhance.label: Real-ESRGAN General x4v3
enhance.description: General-purpose Real-ESRGAN model, good for mixed content.

enhance.label: SwinIR 4x (Restore)
enhance.description: Restoration upscaler for compression and mild blur cleanup.

enhance.label: GFPGAN v1.4 (Face Restore)
enhance.description: Optional face restoration after heavy edits or upscaling.

civitai._comment: Recommended Civitai models - use version ID for download

image.label: Pony Diffusion V6 XL
image.description: The base model for character consistency and prompt adherence. Best for anime/illustration.

image.label: CyberRealistic Pony
image.description: Best blend of Pony's prompt understanding with photorealism. Excellent for realistic NSFW.

image.label: RealVisXL V5.0
image.description: The gold standard for photorealistic skin texture and lighting. SDXL-based.

image.label: Juggernaut XL
image.description: Cinematic and moody photorealism. Excellent for dramatic lighting and scenes.

image.label: Flux.1 Checkpoint (Easy to Use)
image.description: High-quality Flux checkpoint packaged for easy use with ComfyUI or Forge.

image.label: ADetailer Face Models
image.description: Face detection and enhancement models for better face quality in generations.

video.label: LTX Video (Image to Video)
video.description: Fast, lightweight video generation workflow. Best for local RTX cards (8GB+ VRAM).

video.label: Mochi 1 Video Pack
video.description: High motion fidelity video model. Excellent for smooth animations and motion.

video.label: AnimateDiff SDXL (Odinson)
video.description: Workflow to animate SDXL images using AnimateDiff. Turn still images into videos.

video.label: AnimateDiff Lightning
video.description: Fast AnimateDiff model with 4-step generation. Good for quick video previews.

chat.label: Local Model (auto-detect)
chat.description: Automatically detect and use the first available model from your vLLM/TGI server.

chat.label: GPT-4o
chat.description: Latest GPT-4 optimized model with vision capabilities.

chat.label: Claude Opus 4.5
chat.description: Most capable Claude model with advanced reasoning.

chat.label: IBM Granite 13B Chat v2
chat.description: IBM's Granite model optimized for chat.

generation_presets._comment: Curated generation presets for specific use cases. Use with compatible models.

anime_fan_service_adult.label: Anime Fan Service (Adult)
anime_fan_service_adult.description: Preset for mature anime illustrations. Optimized for ecchi and fan service content with tasteful presentation.

prompt_injection.positive_prefix: masterpiece, best quality, ultra-detailed, anime style, illustration, vibrant colors, professional lighting,
prompt_injection.positive_suffix: , highly detailed face, beautiful eyes, dynamic pose
prompt_injection.negative: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, deformed, disfigured, mutation, mutated, ugly, disgusting, out of frame, duplicate, poorly drawn face, poorly drawn hands

safety_guidelines: All depicted characters must be visibly adult (18+)
Content must remain within ecchi/fan service boundaries
No explicit sexual acts or genitalia
Focus on artistic presentation and aesthetics

anime_sfw.label: Anime (SFW)
anime_sfw.description: General-purpose anime preset for safe-for-work illustrations.

prompt_injection.positive_prefix: masterpiece, best quality, ultra-detailed, anime style, illustration,
prompt_injection.negative: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, nsfw, nude, explicit

anime_romantic.label: Anime Romantic Scene
anime_romantic.description: Preset for romantic anime scenes. Tasteful intimacy without explicit content.

prompt_injection.positive_prefix: masterpiece, best quality, ultra-detailed, anime style, romantic atmosphere, soft lighting, intimate moment,
prompt_injection.positive_suffix: , emotional, tender, beautiful composition, cinematic lighting
prompt_injection.negative: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, deformed, ugly, explicit, pornographic, vulgar

safety_guidelines: Focus on emotional connection and romantic atmosphere
All characters must be visibly adult (18+)
